data.title: Herat weather forecast, climate chart: temperature, humidity (average
data.meta_description: Herat current conditions, weather forecast and climate chart (temperature and humidity). Herat free weather widget (free script for your website or blog). Herat weather conditions, average/minimum/maximum temperature, humidity variation graphs. Herat local time, GMT offset and weather information.

Temperature: 90°F (32°C)

Humidity: 11%

Wind: 3 mph (5 km/h); variable direction

Pressure: 1013

Dew Point: 28°F (-2°C)

Temperature variation graph for the last seven days

Weather Station: Herat (latitude 34-13N, longitude 062-13E)

Local Time:

Herat is in the "Asia/Kabul" timezone.

The "Asia/Kabul" timezone uses a Standard Time (ST) / Daylight Saving Time (DST) alternation scheme, and it currently is in ST (since Monday, 1 January 1945, 00:30 AM local time). During ST, the offset to Universal Time (UTC, GMT or Zulu) is +4:30 hours.

Herat will exit standard time (entering DST) on Tuesday, 19 January 2038, at 07:44 AM local time, when clocks will be turned forward 0 hour to Tuesday, 19 January 2038, 07:44 AM local daylight time. During DST, the offset to UTC will be +4:30 hours.
